name: Planning and Project Management in the Arts and Cultural Sector
description: This course provides a broad foundation of project management and planning knowledge and skills. Topics such as project and special event management (including tours, festivals, etc.), and strategic and business planning (including entrepreneurship) will be discussed in the context of organizational processes.
prerequisites: 8.0 credits including VPAB13H3, VPAB16H3 and ACMB01H3
